job_tasks.phrase: Are you confident that AI is going to change our daily work as developers? Do you want to play an active role in shaping that future?
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a focus on the impact of AI on development workflows, suggesting the role will involve integrating AI into existing or new development processes.

job_tasks.phrase: At this moment we're building an AI-Powered coding agent to speed up routine tasks, to improve your work, or to learn different approaches or technologies.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of an AI-powered tool (coding agent) to enhance developer productivity, which falls under integrating AI into software development.

job_tasks.phrase: At the same time we're building the underlying platform to power AI driven workflows across GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the creation of a platform that enables AI-driven workflows, a core software engineering task focused on enabling AI capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: As our new Backend Engineer, you'll build out our core service written that hosts and coordinates our AI agents.
job_tasks.justification: Building a core service to host and coordinate AI agents is a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be involved in making sure the service follows up-to-date best practices for Python web development
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions traditional software development practices for a Python web service.

job_tasks.phrase: orchestrating the communication between different services via gRPC
job_tasks.justification: Orchestrating communication between services using gRPC is a standard backend software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: as well as contributing to the core AI functionality.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to core AI functionality implies involvement in the development or integration of AI models themselves, not just the surrounding infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Write high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code while adhering to best practices and contributing to code reviews
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of core software engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Build a highly scalable web platform based on Python and gRPC that can be deployed in different environments.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the construction of a scalable web platform, a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Design and develop interactions with the latest LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and developing interactions with LLMs directly relates to how the models are used and prompted, fitting the definition of prompt engineering and LLM interaction.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to a testing infrastructure that allows us to verify agentic AI behaviours.
job_tasks.justification: Building testing infrastructure for AI behaviors falls under the operational and MLOps aspects of managing AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Advocate for improvements to product quality, security, and performance
job_tasks.justification: This is a general software engineering responsibility focused on the quality and performance of the product.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs ensuring scalability, performance, maintainability and measurability of our Duo Workflow platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes collaboration on architectural and technical design, core software engineering activities focused on platform development.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in Tier 2 or Tier 3 weekday, weekend, and/or occasional night on-call rotations to assist troubleshooting product operations, security operations, and urgent engineering issues.
job_tasks.justification: On-call rotations for troubleshooting product and engineering issues are part of the operational responsibilities for maintaining a software system.

job_tasks.phrase: We're partnering with teams both within the AI space as well as all over GitLab to ensure that Duo Workflow can become the backbone of many AI features at GitLab.
job_tasks.justification: Partnering to make a workflow the backbone of AI features implies integration and foundational software development for AI capabilities.

soft_skills.phrase: Embrace continuous learning and stay connected with industry best practices, tools, and technologies around AI to drive improvements in our software.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions continuous learning and staying updated with AI technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with more Senior Engineers on the architectural plans and technical designs
soft_skills.justification: This highlights collaboration with other engineers on technical designs.

soft_skills.phrase: play an active role in shaping that future?
soft_skills.justification: This indicates a proactive and shaping role in the future of AI-driven development.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as building scalable web platforms, writing high-quality code, adhering to best practices, orchestrating services via gRPC, and contributing to code reviews and architectural designs. While it involves AI (specifically LLMs and AI agents), the core focus is on building the platform and services that host and coordinate these AI components, rather than deep model development or specialized GenAI research. The role is about integrating AI capabilities into a software product, making it an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, explicitly mentioning software development practices, the technologies involved (Python, gRPC), and the integration of AI components. The distinction between building the AI-powered platform and developing the AI models themselves is well-defined, allowing for a confident profile assignment.
